doc:
Tom Berenger https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tom_Berenger 0 Tom Berenger (born Thomas Michael Moore; May 31, 1949) is an American television and motion picture actor. He was nominated for the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor for his portrayal of Staff Sergeant Bob Barnes in Platoon (1986). He is also known for playing Jake Taylor in the Major League films and Thomas Beckett in the Sniper films. Other films he appeared in include Looking for Mr. Goodbar (1977), The Dogs of War (1980), The Big Chill (1983), Eddie and the Cruisers (1983), Betrayed (1988), The Field (1990), Gettysburg (1993), The Substitute (1996), One Man's Hero (1999), Training Day (2001), and Inception (2010). Berenger won the Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Supporting Actor in a Miniseries or a Movie for his performance as Jim Vance in the 2012 miniseries Hatfields McCoys. Tom_Berenger ( born Thomas_Michael_Moore ; May_31_,_1949 ) is an_American_television_and_motion_picture_actor . He was_nominated for the_Academy_Award for Best Supporting_Actor for his_portrayal of Staff_Sergeant_Bob_Barnes in Platoon_(_1986_) . He is_also_known for playing Jake_Taylor in the_Major_League_films and Thomas_Beckett in the_Sniper_films . Other_films he appeared in include_Looking for Mr._Goodbar ( 1977_) , The_Dogs of War_(_1980_) , The_Big_Chill_(_1983 ) , Eddie and the_Cruisers ( 1983 ) , Betrayed (_1988_) , The_Field ( 1990_) , Gettysburg_(_1993_) , The_Substitute_(_1996_) , One_Man 's_Hero_(_1999_) , Training Day_(_2001_) , and Inception_(_2010_) . Berenger won the_Primetime_Emmy_Award for Outstanding_Supporting_Actor in a_Miniseries or a_Movie for his_performance as Jim_Vance in the_2012_miniseries_Hatfields_ .
